snippet: The photographer Tess Mayer, interested in “how farming shapes people,” documented new farmers with urban ties and the deeply rooted farm families in New York’s Southern Tier....
abstract: Tess Mayer offers photographs of interactions between established and new farm families in her hometown of Bovina, NY.
lead_paragraph: The photographer Tess Mayer, interested in “how farming shapes people,” documented new farmers with urban ties and the deeply rooted farm families in New York’s Southern Tier.

headline.main: Crops of Old and New Farmers in Delaware County
